opening_theme: "Welcome!! DISCO Kemo Kemo Ke (Welcome!!DISCOけもけもけ)" by Kokkuri-san (CV: Daisuke Ono). Narration by Inugami (CV: Takahiro Sakurai), Shigaraki (CV: Jouji Nakata) (eps 2-11)

#3: "This Merry-Go-Round Song (Piano Version)" by Atsushi Suemitsu (ep 8)
